column3: This includes confirmed cases of any influenza virus. Only a fraction of potential cases of influenza are tested by labs to confirm whether they have influenza and to identify their strain or lineage.

FluNet Data Explorer: Weekly confirmed cases of influenza A H1N1 (2009)
column3: Only a fraction of potential cases of influenza are tested by labs to confirm whether they have influenza and to identify their subtype. This shows the number of cases that were confirmed to have a strain of influenza A virus related to the H1N1 ("Swine flu") pandemic that emerged in 2009.

FluNet Data Explorer: Weekly confirmed cases of influenza A H1
column3: Only a fraction of potential cases of influenza are tested by labs to confirm whether they have influenza and to identify their subtype. This shows the number of cases that were confirmed to be of the H1 strain of influenza A virus.

FluNet Data Explorer: Weekly confirmed cases of influenza A H3
column3: Only a fraction of potential cases of influenza are tested by labs to confirm whether they have influenza and to identify their subtype. This shows the number of cases that were confirmed to be of the H3 strain of influenza A virus.

FluNet Data Explorer: Weekly confirmed cases of influenza A H5
column3: Only a fraction of potential cases of influenza are tested by labs to confirm whether they have influenza and to identify their subtype. This shows the number of cases that were confirmed to be of the H5 strain of influenza A virus.

FluNet Data Explorer: Weekly confirmed cases of influenza A H7N9
column3: Only a fraction of potential cases of influenza are tested by labs to confirm whether they have influenza and to identify their subtype. This shows the number of cases that were confirmed to be of the H7N9 strain of influenza A virus.

FluNet Data Explorer: Weekly confirmed cases of influenza A (unknown subtype)
column3: Only a fraction of potential cases of influenza are tested by labs to confirm whether they have influenza and to identify their subtype. This shows the number of cases that were confirmed to be influenza A virus, but their subtype was not confirmed.

FluNet Data Explorer: Weekly confirmed cases of influenza A
column3: This includes confirmed cases of any strain of influenza A virus. Only a fraction of potential cases of influenza are tested by labs to confirm whether they have influenza and to identify their strain.

FluNet Data Explorer: Weekly confirmed cases of influenza B Victoria
column3: Only a fraction of potential cases of influenza are tested by labs to confirm whether they have influenza and to identify their subtype. This shows the number of cases that were confirmed to be of the Victoria lineage of influenza B virus.

FluNet Data Explorer: Weekly confirmed cases of influenza B Yamagata
column3: Only a fraction of potential cases of influenza are tested by labs to confirm whether they have influenza and to identify their subtype. This shows the number of cases that were confirmed to be of the Yamagata lineage of influenza B virus.

FluNet Data Explorer: Weekly confirmed cases of influenza B (unknown lineage)
column3: Only a fraction of potential cases of influenza are tested by labs to confirm whether they have influenza and to identify their subtype. This shows the number of cases that were confirmed to be influenza B virus, but their lineage was not determined.

FluNet Data Explorer: Weekly confirmed cases of influenza B
column3: This includes confirmed cases of any lineage of influenza B virus. Only a fraction of potential cases of influenza are tested by labs to confirm whether they have influenza and to identify their lineage.
